** 75% attendance is mandatory to be eligible for all academic and examination related activities.
#Placement activities are scheduled throughout the Academic year 2025-26
$ The students of final year who have failed in some courses of previous years (1st, 2nd and 3rd) or final
year on account of very less sessional marks, shall be eligible to appear for mid semester exams in those
subjects along with the regular students in subsequent years.
